name: Wizards Are Bad
description:
Made for the LDJam (Ludum Dare 31) in 48-72 hours

Survive as long as you can.

An evil wizard will try to destroy your castle with his evil fireballs.

Keep your dwarves alive as long as you can. Chop down trees. Build a fortress. Don't get hit by fireballs.

Controls:
Left click and Drag from the ground or a wall to build.
Right click to remove construction lines.
